Articles.Content: With the new update, i was trying to land and do the EVA report in the right area, but once I land very close to the site, i cant tell where i need to go! I can't zoom in anywhere on the globe or anything and once the kerbal is out of the ship, i have no idea if he's even walking in the right direction. a compass that would point towards your objective and that would have your ship on it would be really nice for when you're doing an EVA.
